name: BEST WESTERN De Anza Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights in early February and it was first class. Easy and convenient parking and quick check-in / check-out. And the room. Wow! Big room, clean and very nice, on the 3rd floor. Great value for the money!
reviews.title: First class!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is close to perfect. Cannery Row and Monterey Bay Aquarium is only 10 minutes away by car. Make sure to have dinner at Gianni's while you are in Monterey.
reviews.title: great midpoint between expensive hotels and cheap motels

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: This is clearly one of the best Best Western hotels ! The rooms look brand new - the bathroom has tile floors and granite vanity tops. Only the tub/shower has been updated in a less expensive manner, but all of the fixtures are of good quality.
reviews.title: highly recommendable!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room itself was furnished with not only nice furniture, but other nice decorative touches. It definitely feels homey and welcoming. The bedroom is large enough to accommodate an entertainment armoire (TV, microwave, large mini-frig), as well as providing storage for clothes; a sofa (I think it's also a sofa bed ?); nice desk/chair for working; and an easy chair for relaxing and watching TV. It is clearly large enough for a family of four, so this would make it a good value in that case.
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The breakfast was the standard continental style - cereals, breads, fruit, juice, and eggs. Everything tasted fresh and of good quality. The area was kept clean and all items were well organized. The coffee was good and strong and tea and hot chocolate are also available.
reviews.title: One night stay in Monterey

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: It's your budget comfortable and clean hotel.
reviews.title: Nice Place for a Nice Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing special about it. Location OK, far from the touristic side of Monterey, but close to HWY-1.
reviews.title: An Incredibly Great Surprise!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The rooms are big, modern and clean. Nice LCD TV, Nice Bay Window.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable beds, no unpleasant odors, nice shower, quiet.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel in general is new and clean. Not much comfort (No room service, no baggage help) but maybe it's too much to ask for a Bed+Breakfast.
reviews.title: Enjoyed my stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: If you are looking for a cheap, clean and comfortable place to Sleep+Shower you got it!
reviews.title: Good lodging but not such a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed in a king bed with sofabed. It was quite a large room and we had plenty of room to have our pack n play for the baby. Everything about the room was nice, no complaints. Not really a complaint, but the tub wouldn't hold water for a bath. No biggie. We had no issues with hearing neighbors, and we know the hotel was fully booked. The continental breakfast was muffins, toast, and cereal, your standard fare, nothing special. Our kids really liked the koi pond in the front foyer. We'd stay here again.
reviews.title: Comfortable stay at a good price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Booked the hotel based on trip advisor reviews, was apprehensive as hadn't stayed in a Best Western before, but now I have stayed in several! Although you need to drive to Monterey once you don't mind that I would recommend this place. Rooms were clean and spacious, although the breakfast area was small it was more than adequate and there was fruit available. It was good value for the price we paid and I would stay here again if in the area.
reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: stayed several nights during a golf trip to Monterey. (I was in a room that connects with the next, so I could hear my neighbours, but they were quiet at bedtime so not a concern.)
reviews.title: good value; great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were extremely helpful and courteous.
reviews.title: For money, great...but Walls are thin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: Only criticism: compared to other Best Westerns and comparable hotels, the complementary breakfast was sub-par.
reviews.title: Best Hotel for the money!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Best Western is top of the list in terms of cleanliness and quality. From the moment you walk into the lobby and see the travel brochures stacked perfectly on top of one another its apparent the attention to detail is there. Our room was nice and big and the continental breakfast was very nice. Free internet appreciated.
reviews.title: Meticulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a single queen room for one night. Seems like a good value for the area. If staying again, I would get a double queen or king (even if you don't need to use it) in order to get a larger room.
reviews.title: OK value (for the area)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: A great value plus walking distance to restaurants

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -Free wifi and limited (continental) breakfast
reviews.title: Quality hotel, but...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -Friendly service
reviews.title: Big room. Helpful staff. Free breakfast and Wifi

aka: Best Western Plus De Anza Hotel Monterey
description: Only three and a half miles from the top attraction, Monterey Bay Aquarium, our Monterey hotel is a great value with reasonable rates. Cannery Row and Fisherman's Wharf are just a short drive. Guests at our Monterey hotel can choose to spend the day lounging at the beach or exploring the local city. Seafood reigns supreme at the local restaurants, and there's an abundance of shopping to be had. The Monterey Peninsula offers travelers everything necessary for a memorable vacation.
